name: Scroke
description:
all i got so far is player stuff, some menu stuff, and some other stuff

you can click on nearby scrooks to damage them

still need to do ai and other stuff

i just want people to test the movement and get a feel for it

only skeem(the little bird guy) is the most complete right now

CONTROLS

wasd: move
space: jump, hold space to glide
shift: sprint
e on "grass"(green sand): graze

escape to bring up the menu and then there's a "show debug" button that you can press to bring up some info and some sliders that let you edit speed and stuff

PEDIA and OPTIONS buttons currently do nothing so press them as much as you like if you like the sound it makes
